channel.title: How to change level req. on weapons/armor

item.title: How to change level req. on weapons/armor
item.dc:creator: @Something_all_OVer Something all OVer
item.description:
@Something_all_OVer wrote:

In your client.java under public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {
and change this stuff always can do for def, it always worked for me so it probly work for u.

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; }

Read full topic
